channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hilton Axes Hotel From Their Systems After Video Shows Them Continuing to Ban DHS and ICE Agents
House GOP Rep Doug LaMalfa dead at 65
item.description: California Congressman Doug LaMalfa has passed away at age 65.

item.title: Leftwing Journo's Zeal to 'Expose' the Delta Force Commander Who Took Down Maduro Backfires Spectacularly
Mamdani admits he has no federal security clearance after claiming he was 'briefed' on Venezuela raid
item.description: NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani admitted he lacks security clearance after saying he was "briefed" on Nicolas Maduro's capture this weekend.

item.title: The Corporation for Public Broadcasting Is Officially Dissolved — Let's Salt the Earth Where It Stood

National Rifle Association sues its charitable foundation, alleging takeover by 'disgruntled' ex-board members
item.description: Former NRA directors accused of seizing control of charitable foundation to compete with gun rights group after losing board power amid scandals.
